channel.title: Projects on Sohanuzzaman
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Sohanuzzaman

item.title: UTKFace-Multitask-ViT
item.description: Built a custom ViT encoder with task-specific heads for age, race, and gender classification. Implemented multi-task loss balancing, mixed-precision training, and experiment tracking notebooks to benchmark attention-sharing strategies.

item.title: Wall-E Waste Classifier
item.description: Designed a playful user experience that captures waste items, runs quantized TFLite models locally, and queries Gemini for disposal tips. Hardened Firebase auth rules, added offline caching, and documented deployment for both Android and iOS builds.

item.title: Campus Portal System
item.description: Implemented role-aware dashboards, secure messaging, and real-time announcements with Firestore security rules. Focused on predictable state management and responsive layouts to keep experience consistent on Android, iOS, and web builds.
